title: Reborn To Rebel
lyrics:
Ayy (Uhh)
N-O (Haha)
Hell no (Ay, ay, ay, ay, ay, ay)
Yuh, yuh, yuh, uh (ayy)
I met the devil my soul I'm not selling but hello
Run armageddon, your soul are you selling? N-O

Snorlax, I'm lazy, come tickle me baby, Elmo

Let's start a riot, fuck if you tired, yell out



I don't care if you don't care, we don't

I don't care if you don't care, we don't

Life ain't fair, we ain't scared, we know

I don't care if you don't care, we don’t



And for us to survive we need to uprise our people

Must sanitize the thought of demise, of freedom

Like Allstate, you're in good hands with me though

Taking our children they got us searchin' like for Nemo

I won't take no shit from the government

They been had plans for this, wasn't suddenly

And any time I can, I take the system's hand and crumble it

Whenever you can make a difference, yell it out, don't mumble it

I distract myself from the world, to stay in my element

The heart I carry takes on the weight of good people's negligence

So if the government don't give a shit you can't stay mad again

Cause we already feel the same way about how they handle shit



I met the devil my soul I'm not selling but hello (Hello)

Run armageddon, your soul are you selling? N-O (N-O)

Snorlax, I'm lazy, come tickle me baby, Elmo (Elmo)

Let’s start a riot, fuck if you tired, yell out (yuh, yuh, yuh, yuh, yuh)



I don't care if you don't care, we don't (Uh)

I don't care if you don’t care, we don't (Uh)

Life ain't fair, we ain’t scared, we know

I don't care if you don’t care, we don't



Yes, this is a new peacoat, and I paid my taxes

Like Carmelo with the free throw, on they ass like grass

I may seem flyer than a seagull, Harry Potter glasses

Cleaning Stanley Steamer steam hoe, call me Ski no slow slope

Humanity sucks, humanity blows, no cello

No hablo Español, but dinero

Drop my top, JFK, leggo

They wanna link, they try to build, Legos

Hold on to something, I am eruptin'

It’s a destruction, sons of the anarchy

Bust up teeth for my lunch bitch, with no discussion

This is disgusting', fake it to make it you-



I met the devil my soul I’m not selling but hello

Run armageddon, your soul are you selling? N-O

Snorlax, I'm lazy, come tickle me baby, Elmo

Let’s start a riot, fuck if you tired, yell out (Fuck if you tired, yellow out)



I don’t care if you don’t care, we don’t

I don’t care if you don’t care, we don’t

Life ain’t fair, we ain’t scared, we know

I don’t care if you don’t care, we don’t
